Reviews.Title: Great Starter Kit for EOS 60D. Excellent Quality but Missing a few for Pro-Photography
Reviews.Author: Captain Aus
Reviews.Content: Its a great camera to get your started with Pro-Level photography. The stock lenses 18-55mm and 75-300mm are great starter lenses though I would have much rather preferred the 18-135mm lens with the kit but no complains here. You get everything to get you going with wonderful photos. As with any DSLRs, you can do wonders if you know how to use the camera. Canon EOS-60D surpasses both in picture and build quality compared to its Nikon counterparts (D90, D5000, D7100). Just Google the comparison with Nikon 7100 and you will realize how good this camera is.Do invest in a better tripod (monopod)than the one in the kit. I would also recommend that you read Digital Photography Vol 1-3 from Scott Kelby, even if you already are a pro. Its a great way to get into serious photography without going into the geeky details. (You can always do that later).Overall worth an investment. I have ordered the 18-135mm from the seller, anyways.

Reviews.Title: worth it
Reviews.Author: josh
Reviews.Content: I like this package. of course you have the camera witch is a fantastic camera and i really like that you get two different lenses. the standard 18-55mm is great for indoors and just casual photography, it does what you need without making the camera too heavy. the 75-300 is great for outdoor's and more artistic photography. be aware that this lens doesn't have a stabilizer function and gets really shaky when turned to 300mm and hand held, good thing the package also comes with a tripod.If you're looking at getting this package for the accessories aside from the camera and lenses then I would be a little hesitant. the only extra's that really make a difference is the 16GB SD card (even though it's a little slow), tripod, and the extra battery. probably only a $50-$70 value. the bag is a joke, you will NEED to buy a better camera bag and they can be rather expensive. everything else is nice to have but not really needed.when it comes down to it, it's a great deal if the different lenses are what you're looking for. If one lens is what you want I would recommend Costco's package with a 18-135mm lens, faster SD card, and nice camera bag.

Reviews.Title: Great camera and lenses, everything else is rubbish.
Reviews.Author: Travis
Reviews.Content: The camera proper and the two lenses included are stunning. In all honesty, I only purchased the kit because these lenses as well as the camera are worth more than the entire kit, so it was a bargain compared to buying locally. The rest of what might as well be freebies seem only to be packaged to sweeten the deal. The tripod I disposed of without a second thought. It was begging to collapse with my new camera on it. The two lens attachments (Macro and telephoto) only give a blurred and low-quality image. At a stretch, you could use them artistically, but are quite poor-quality for the purpose proposed. The flash is the only extra that holds its own, but does so in the lowest possible manner. It's about on-par with the camera flash, and is only really useful if you activate it wirelessly from a different angle for portrait lighting (you'll need more attachments and adapters for that, though). I trust the bag to hold the camera, so it does its job, but it's not a nice-looking bag by any means. Mine was branded generically as "Focus". The card is an official Sony one, so I expect good things for it. haven't tried the card reader, but modern computers have a build-in reader anyway. I've attached the UV filters if only to protect my lens front element from physical damage, UV protection serving as a secondary purpose. They don't seem to compromise image quality. The mini-HDMI cable looks sturdy, but haven't checked to see if it is a dud or not. Cleaning kit? Eh. Wiped one lens with it, seemed to work. Haven't even looked at the DVD yet, looks to be another gimmick. Anything I've deigned not to mention is irrelevant or worthless. I'm giving it four stars, if only because it's annoying to sort through all the useless junk to get to the main goodies. That said, they can't really detract from the price/worth ratio. Solid purchase.

Reviews.Title: So so
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Skip this package, the tripod was pretty cheap. The top broke the first week. All the cables were nice and the recharge haven't used but the case sucks. I actually ordered another case which is much more stylish and less tourist. Len's is the standard...all and all if I did it again, I would have bought the camera and everything separately, live and learn.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: E K
Reviews.Content: I bought this package about 3 or 4 weeks ago. I wanted wait and see before I wrote a review. I must say I was very pleased with this package but I was expecting some products to be junk. Lets starts with the cons: tripod was junk, broke first try using it, the card reader, the same, deleted everything I had on the card and the computer wouldn't read it. Like I said I was expecting that. Now with the goods the lenses work great. I use the smaller one mainly for video and the other works great for pictures. Camera is easy to use and has great features. I am a film maker and I have been making a short film with this camera and so far it's great. I would highly recommend this package for you.

Reviews.Title: The Camera is ok, but the other itens...
Reviews.Author: AGR
Reviews.Content: The camera and lenses are ok. They are very good Cannon pruducts! But other itens are not.Delivery is ok, too. No problems to deliver the pruduct in Brazil. Brazilians must only take care of taxes!The problems I had...The bag has broken twice, in an interval of less than one mounth since it arrived my home. Two plastic locks are broken. One of then, broke in the first day, made my camera fall to floor. So don't trust in the bag.The extra battery pack ends very fast. CAnnon battery lasts more than 4 weekends. The extra one lasts only aprox. half that time.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS 60D Camera Package
Reviews.Author: kdobbins
Reviews.Content: I was very impressed with the camera package. I did quite a bit of shopping at Best Buy and Fry's Electronics, Sam's Club and Costco. I could not duplicate the value anywhere. I received the package when promised, I used the 1 day shipping. Everything was received as promised and the sd card being upgraded at no additional cost was a true treat.

Reviews.Title: You will be amazed at this product!
Reviews.Author: Dave n.
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my wife for Christmas and we could hardly believe all of the items they packed into this kit! Truly amazing for the money! And the Camera is WILD with options and abilities. This thing will be with us for many, many years to come. What a beautiful thing! I'm still shaking my head.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Lori Silcox
Reviews.Content: Best pro/semi-pro camera I have ever used. Absolutely love it!  Great features, clear shots, and easy enough for most to use. Highly recommend...great value for the price

Reviews.Title: 60D Canon
Reviews.Author: Craig Hawley
Reviews.Content: This is a nice Camera, ease to use. I like the LDS screen, that you can turn it so you can see what you are taking a picture of and view picture that have taken.I would recommend this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Worth it
Reviews.Author: mrmar
Reviews.Content: The package comes with a 16G SD card missing and both batteries are not from Canon company. I contacted the custome service, and they're very kind to send me another SD card and replace one of the battery with the Canon battery. Everything else are reall good, except the tripod is a little bit lame. In general, I think it's worthy to buy.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: kurt l "kurt"
Reviews.Content: this camera is awesome, i expected to really struggle with it initially as i bought it to shoot sports action. first time i used it, i got very good quality pictures so i was really happy knowing that with minimal tweeking, im going to have great pictures. tripod IS JUNK as others have said, mine was broken upon delivery but i think im going to be extremely happy with it

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: jrazor
Reviews.Content: Awesome value and quality! The items still smelled like fresh tech even though they say refurbished. I would have spent way more cash if I had bought the items individually.

Reviews.Title: awsome camera
Reviews.Author: jaminjay
Reviews.Content: been playing with this camera for a little over a week and i must say that it takes wonderful pictures from distant to macro simply awsome. the reason for the four stars is the tripod that it came with, it is cheap but hey the camera and lenses, extra battery, and cleaning kit make up for it,.

Reviews.Title: Canon 60D
Reviews.Author: SammyC
Reviews.Content: This Camera is great and the guys I got it from were great. I got it super fast and it had a bunch of cool extras come with it. It was refurbished but it works just fine. I never had a problem. Awesome camera I've been working with it every day for about 3 months now. Better for video that photography but still great for photograph.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME :)
Reviews.Author: HM006
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! I'm sort of new-ish at operating cameras like this but this camera met all my expectations and I'm looking forward to learning how to use it better.

Reviews.Title: Excellent purchase
Reviews.Author: Val
Reviews.Content: This camera has great technical resources, such as an articulated monitor that allows you to photograph from different angles and the function quick control. Perfect weight for a semi-professional camera.

Reviews.Title: awsome in low light
Reviews.Author: J. Ruiz
Reviews.Content: I ended up buying the 60D from costco but its a great camera, love it. Its hard to take bad pictures with this camera. This camera also takes really good pictures in very very low light.

Reviews.Title: I'm sorry to ACE!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: RICCOH
Reviews.Content: At first I gave this kit a bad review. Because, I didn't receive the card reader. I thought it was a "flash card" and they would not send me a flash card. So, I was disapionted and gave them a bad review. When I reolized its a card reader, I call them again and they made it right by sending me one. Thank you! That kit was a GREAT deal! I love my camera, Canon 60D and feel like a PRO with the pictures it takes in a snap! Love It!!!!RICCOHColorado

Reviews.Title: Highly recommended!
Reviews.Author: Penny
Reviews.Content: I am VERY happy with this purchase. We bought it through Big Mike's Electronics, they were awesome to work with. Everything arrived on time, included everything that was to be included, there was no damage, etc. I would highly recommend this product. We saved a lot of money vs buyig this at Best Buy, the cost of the 2 lenses alone made up the cost difference. All of the products are working perfectly, we have no problems. I would highly recommend this product to anyone interested in photography.

Reviews.Title: Nice deal
Reviews.Author: D. F. Russell
Reviews.Content: great package.  the lens's and body made it a very good deal. the rest were a bonus.  i got my at $1279 this week.  price is now about $150 higher.  even better deal.

Reviews.Title: Happy with purchase and CS!
Reviews.Author: Danielle M. Ouellette "-S."
Reviews.Content: First of i screw up my order (personal cc instead of corp cc). Amazon told me sorry cant help you, however i contacted the vendor, and they cancelled and refunded the order right away, and i re-placed the order. So customer service is A+.Now on to the product, i was amazed how well packed it was, and the amount of stuff that came in the box, just between the camera and lenses you got your money's worth, the rest is a nice added bonus. I got this as a gift, amd the person loves it!!!

Reviews.Title: quality of kit
Reviews.Author: Hank Stevens
Reviews.Content: The tripod and the bag is not the best, but I did'nt buy this kit for that. The camera so far is working out well, the lenses could be better but for the price not to bad.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera, extras were cheap, but thats what I expected
Reviews.Author: Paul Millsaps
Reviews.Content: I love the camera, and lenses that came with the kit, which were the main reason I purchased this setup.  Some of the extras are useful, but will be replaced as soon as I can find some alternatives.  The bag is nice, but doesn't have a lot of extra room for additional items, especially for items such as a laptop.  So I will be replacing a lot of the accessories, but the main part of the purchase is awesome.

Reviews.Title: Promised and delivered
Reviews.Author: Marty Cordova
Reviews.Content: Delivered on time and the product delivers everything promised and more. I've been using it for a few days now and the quality of the product is great, the photos are excellent. I'm a good photographer but I honestly believe that the Cannon 60D will help me become a better one.

Reviews.Title: very intelligent
Reviews.Author: Ahmed Fouad Shukri
Reviews.Content: every thing went brilliant and OK and it is amazing for sure that you are the best amazonAppreciated for your support and services as well as green hill

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Robert Kent
Reviews.Content: over all great product.  me and my wife are super happy with what we got.  gonna make for a great photo album from our upcoming road trip.  thanks

Reviews.Title: GREAT DEAL!
Reviews.Author: Kyle S.
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! i have had it for a few years and i have had no problem with the lenses or camera. Thr tripod is junk however. froke the first time i set it up. Other than that its worth every penny!

Reviews.Title: Fan of the 60D camera
Reviews.Author: Jermaine Quick
Reviews.Content: Most sites offered the new camera w/lens at 999.00 plus. What was in the box was extra to me. I know we all look for deals but when you consider the light, lenses, charger, bag, and tripod(cheap or not) this package was well worth it.

Reviews.Title: great quality
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Bullock "Jen"
Reviews.Content: This came in very quickly (did the overnight) everything was as it said it would be, packed in perfectly and I like the quality. It's a nice camera with lots of bells and whistles to play with and the batteries have a long life to them.  The tripod a little on the small side but really not the highest item on my list so I didn't exactly mind that. Overall I rate this pretty high.

Reviews.Title: is perfect!!
Reviews.Author: Henry Turcios
Reviews.Content: I choose this kind of camera because I heard good recommendations about it and it meet my expectations. It have a great resolution  and great quality, it was a really good decision to get it

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Ezequiel Giglio
Reviews.Content: An excellent camera, and not yet the more expensive.A good option for pro beginners.Excellent not only for photo, but also a beautiful tool for video.

Reviews.Title: this is excellent choice
Reviews.Author: Tamara
Reviews.Content: my estimation is excellent,i like this camera and cervice.my purchase executed quickly and in full completing.This product recomended my son.

Reviews.Title: Canon 60 D
Reviews.Author: Amjad
Reviews.Content: The camera was fantastic I like to take photos very where I go , it's very good camera and Cheap too and I like to buy an  other one , thanks amazon  amjad

Reviews.Title: it is so good!!!
Reviews.Author: Bei
Reviews.Content: all the stuffs in this package is good except the tripod, it is so small and unstable! I think I would buy a larger one later~

Reviews.Title: This was great
Reviews.Author: JUAN Z FIGUEROA
Reviews.Content: The Combo was all inclusive all necessary parts for starting a great photo experience. Everything came on time and all products were what i expected.

Reviews.Title: Best deal on the Internet
Reviews.Author: tim kershner
Reviews.Content: This is a good deal. The bag is a little small, the tripod is a little cheap- but they both work fine. The camera and lens are excellent. Almost felt bad taking advantage of the seller. Highly recommend this bundle.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Robbie "Taintedbyfire"
Reviews.Content: For the amount of things in this package it is a steal! I would recommend anyone starting out get one of these packs.

Reviews.Title: A good upgrade from my Rebel
Reviews.Author: GatorGirl68
Reviews.Content: This was an upgrade to my rebel after getting sand in my lens (never change lens on the beach or in the desert)!  This bundle was an excellant value and even though I havent used everything, the camera alone is worth its weight in gold. Good clear, crisp photos. Easy to use. Love the continuous shooting. Can't think of anything bad about it.

Reviews.Title: good price
Reviews.Author: Jim Riddle
Reviews.Content: just a great price was what I was looking for  wish it more lens needs a bigger bag than comes with the kit

Reviews.Title: Great product!!
Reviews.Author: Sajan Rajagopal
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a replacement for Canon Xsi (450D) and the camera is great value for the money. The tripod is not a for professional photographers, but overall good bang for the buck.

Reviews.Title: Great value for lens and camera
Reviews.Author: Unknown
Reviews.Content: the price is worth it for the lens themselves. the added accessories were pretty cheap being a generic brand zeikos. the bag isnt that great, something temporary until you get another with better use. the extra battery drained really quick when i used it, after  100 shots it was down to 50% and the memory card is slow. you could probably get a better deal with just the lens and body and find the other accessories at a better quality with a decent price. overall the what made it worth it was just the lens and camera

Reviews.Title: amazing product so worth the price
Reviews.Author: Trini
Reviews.Content: This product just blew my expectations the price was off the hook and the product itself is jus amazing.............i love it so much i am up at 3am takin pics inside my house :)

Reviews.Title: A must have!
Reviews.Author: THUMP MEDiA
Reviews.Content: Whether you shoot still or movies, this is a fantastic piece of equipment to have! Great picture and ease of use! Only thing I would change with the kit, is to not only have zoom lenses. A shorter lens works better for my use as a filmmaker.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS 60D 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Lens & EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens +
Reviews.Author: kereninotech
Reviews.Content: I received my EOS 60D few weeks ago now, so far so good, i haven't used one of these before so i'm still learning.The Photo quality looks really Great. I'm having issues with Video though looks like a lot of focusing is required to get good quality. It would be nice if the Camera could automatically focus when it is in Video Mode.Other than still learning.kereninotech

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Graziella Callado
Reviews.Content: The kit came in perfect condition. All the accessories were intact, packed/wrapped. The package arrived before time expected/scheduled. Spare battery came with it (unexpected), and car battery charger. It was a great surprise, I highly recommend. Definitely trustworthy.Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Good Package deal
Reviews.Author: James B. Register
Reviews.Content: This package contains most everything you need to enjoy the CANON 60D. Lenses are good, but the telephoto lens is NOT an S type which I thought it was. (My mistake!) Otherwise it is a good starter kit.

Reviews.Title: Worth it
Reviews.Author: Me1987
Reviews.Content: Well, the other reviewers are right about the tripod being flimsy, it broke into pieces the second time I used it. They're also right about the camera bag not being the best. Nothing wrong with it, really, it's just an open space with a thin divider, no pockets or anything (unless they're really well hidden). What makes this completely worth it is you get the camera and two lenses. You're getting a huge discount on the lenses, and between the two you get it offers a pretty decent range for zooming. The way it was delivered made me nervous, though. It just comes in a big box, no packing peanuts or anything, and the box was torn at one end...not sure if that was the company's fault or the delivery man's fault, but it's worth noting. All in all, a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Deal!!
Reviews.Author: Alpine
Reviews.Content: You won't find a better deal with this product! The lenses alone with the camera are worth the price. But you get a bunch of stuff with it too. This is well worth the price and I'm glad I bought it. It shipped in a timely manner too. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great package, Great service
Reviews.Author: A. Carrington
Reviews.Content: I am extremely pleased with both the kit and the service that we received. We were thrilled with the quality of everything included in the kit. Our only complaint was that the camera bag we received was different than the one pictured - it was much smaller and didn't have enough storage space for everything included in the kit. So I emailed the seller about the mix-up, and they shipped another bag to me that same day, free of charge. I just received the second bag today and it is perfect - just what we were hoping for.I recommend this kit for it's quality, as well as the wonderful seller who made sure to deliver the purchase as pictured. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Canon 60D Camera
Reviews.Author: Evan Krichevsky
Reviews.Content: I bought the Canon in anticipation of taking a trip to Tanzania to celebrate my father's 80th birthday. I want a camera that will give a lot of options for picture taking. The kit will give me those options. I have already started to learn the details of photography will a DSLR. I look forward to being able to use the camera to control the shots that I take with more details and options than a point and shoot.

ProductInfo.Features:
18.0-megapixel CMOS sensor and DIGIC 4 Imaging Processor
5.3fps continuous shooting up to approx. 58 Large/JPEGs and 16 RAW
Improved EOS HD Video mode with manual exposure control
ISO 100-6400 (expandable to 12800) for shooting from bright to dim light
Enhanced iFCL 63-zone, Dual-layer metering system; and 9-point AF system
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 60D 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Lens & EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens + 16GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
